Event: You know we dont believe half of what they say
Post:
"My heart goes out to my friend who lost their mom to cancer. It's a harsh reminder that life is fragile and can change in an instant. But I can't help but wonder, what if they had caught it earlier? What if they had tried harder? The 'what ifs' haunt me, but I know my friend is strong and will get through this."

This post attributes the cause of the friend's mom passing away to the uncertainty of life and the possibility of not trying hard enough, rather than external factors such as the cancer itself. It also implies that the friend may have some control over the situation, which could be seen as an internal attribution.
